00050 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const char * szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00051 {
00052         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00053         if(bCaseSensitive)
00054         {
00055                 while(*szKey)
00056                 {
00057                         uResult += (unsigned char)(*(szKey));
00058                         szKey++;
00059                 }
00060         } else {
00061                 while(*szKey)
00062                 {
00063                         uResult += (unsigned char)tolower(*(szKey));
00064                         szKey++;
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         return uResult;
00068 }
00069 
00073 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const char * szKey1,const char * szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00074 {
00075         if(bCaseSensitive)
00076         {
00077                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00078                 {
00079                         if(*szKey1 != *szKey2)
00080                                 return false;
00081                         szKey1++;
00082                         szKey2++;
00083                 }
00084         } else {
00085                 while(*szKey1 && *szKey2)
00086                 {
00087                         if(tolower(*szKey1) != tolower(*szKey2))
00088                                 return false;
00089                         szKey1++;
00090                         szKey2++;
00091                 }
00092         }
00093         //check if one of the strings is a substring of the other (like "perl" and "perlcore")
00094         if(*szKey1 || *szKey2)
00095                 return false;
00096         return true;
00097 }
00098 
00102 inline void kvi_hash_key_copy(const char * const &szFrom,const char * &szTo,bool bDeepCopy)
00103 {
00104         if(bDeepCopy)
00105         {
00106                 int len = kvi_strLen(szFrom);
00107                 char * dst = (char *)kvi_malloc(len+1);
00108                 kvi_fastmove(dst,szFrom,len+1);
00109                 szTo = dst;
00110         } else {
00111                 szTo = szFrom; // we never modify it anyway
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00118 inline void kvi_hash_key_destroy(const char * &szKey,bool bDeepCopy)
00119 {
00120         if(bDeepCopy)
00121                 kvi_free(szKey);
00122 }

00130         return static_null;

00136 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const KviStr &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00137 {
00138         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00139         const char * p = szKey.ptr();
00140         if(bCaseSensitive)
00141         {
00142                 while(*p)
00143                 {
00144                         uResult += *((const unsigned char *)p);
00145                         p++;
00146                 }
00147         } else {
00148                 while(*p)
00149                 {
00150                         uResult += tolower(*((const unsigned char *)p));
00151                         p++;
00152                 }
00153         }
00154         return uResult;
00155 }
00156 
00160 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const KviStr &szKey1,const KviStr &szKey2)
00161 {
00162         return kvi_hash_key_equal(szKey1.ptr(),szKey2.ptr());
00163 }

00271 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(void * pKey,bool)
00272 {
00273         unsigned char * pBytes = (unsigned char *)&(pKey);
00274         unsigned char * pEnd = pBytes + sizeof(void *);
00275         unsigned int uSum = 0;
00276         while(pBytes < pEnd)
00277         {
00278                 uSum += *pBytes;
00279                 pBytes++;
00280         }
00281         return uSum;
00282 }

00319 inline unsigned int kvi_hash_hash(const QString &szKey,bool bCaseSensitive)
00320 {
00321         unsigned int uResult = 0;
00322         const QChar * p = KviQString::nullTerminatedArray(szKey);
00323         if(!p)return 0;
00324         if(bCaseSensitive)
00325         {
00326                 while(p->unicode())
00327                 {
00328                         uResult += p->unicode();
00329                         p++;
00330                 }
00331         } else {
00332                 while(p->unicode())
00333                 {
00334                         uResult += p->toLower().unicode();
00335                         p++;
00336                 }
00337         }
00338         return uResult;
00339 }
00340 
00344 inline bool kvi_hash_key_equal(const QString &szKey1,const QString &szKey2,bool bCaseSensitive)
00345 {
00346         if(bCaseSensitive)
00347                 return KviQString::equalCS(szKey1,szKey2);
00348         return KviQString::equalCI(szKey1,szKey2);
00349 }

00374 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTable;
00375 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator;
00376 
00377 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableEntry
00378 {
00379         friend class KviPointerHashTable<Key,T>;
00380 protected:
00381         T  * pData;
00382         Key  hKey;
00383 public:
00384         Key & key(){ return hKey; };
00385         T * data(){ return pData; };
00386 };
00387 
00427 template<class Key,class T> class KviPointerHashTable
00428 {
00429         friend class KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T>;
00430 protected:
00431         KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > ** m_pDataArray;
00432         bool                                                m_bAutoDelete;
00433         unsigned int                                        m_uSize;
00434         unsigned int                                        m_uCount;
00435         bool                                                m_bCaseSensitive;
00436         bool                                                m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00437         unsigned int                                        m_uIteratorIdx;
00438 public:
00447         T * find(const Key & hKey)
00448         {
00449                 m_uIteratorIdx = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00450                 if(!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return 0;
00451                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00452                 {
00453                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))return (T *)e->pData;
00454                 }
00455                 return 0;
00456         }
00457 
00467         T * operator[](const Key & hKey)
00468         {
00469                 return find(hKey);
00470         }
00471 
00476         unsigned int count() const
00477         {
00478                 return m_uCount;
00479         }
00480 
00485         bool isEmpty() const
00486         {
00487                 return m_uCount == 0;
00488         }
00489 
00500         void insert(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00501         {
00502                 if(!pData)return;
00503                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00504                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])
00505                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(true);
00506                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00507                 {
00508                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00509                         {
00510                                 if(!m_bCaseSensitive)
00511                                 {
00512                                         // must change the key too
00513                                         kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00514                                         kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00515                                 }
00516                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00517                                         delete e->pData;
00518                                 e->pData = pData;
00519                                 return;
00520                         }
00521                 }
00522                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * n = new KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T>;
00523                 kvi_hash_key_copy(hKey,n->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00524                 n->pData = pData;
00525                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->append(n);
00526                 m_uCount++;
00527         }
00528 
00540         void replace(const Key & hKey, T * pData)
00541         {
00542                 insert(hKey,pData);
00543         }
00544 
00554         bool remove(const Key & hKey)
00555         {
00556                 unsigned int uEntry = kvi_hash_hash(hKey,m_bCaseSensitive) % m_uSize;
00557                 if(!m_pDataArray[uEntry])return false;
00558                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[uEntry]->next())
00559                 {
00560                         if(kvi_hash_key_equal(e->hKey,hKey,m_bCaseSensitive))
00561                         {
00562                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00563                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00564                                 m_pDataArray[uEntry]->removeRef(e);
00565                                 if(m_pDataArray[uEntry]->isEmpty())
00566                                 {
00567                                         delete m_pDataArray[uEntry];
00568                                         m_pDataArray[uEntry] = 0;
00569                                 }
00570                                 m_uCount--;
00571                                 return true;
00572                         }
00573                 }
00574                 return false;
00575         }
00576 
00586         bool removeRef(const T * pRef)
00587         {
00588                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00589                 {
00590                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00591                         {
00592                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[i]->next())
00593                                 {
00594                                         if(e->pData == pRef)
00595                                         {
00596                                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00597                                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00598                                                 m_pDataArray[i]->removeRef(e);
00599                                                 if(m_pDataArray[i]->isEmpty())
00600                                                 {
00601                                                         delete m_pDataArray[i];
00602                                                         m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00603                                                 }
00604                                                 m_uCount--;
00605                                                 return true;
00606                                         }
00607                                 }
00608                         }
00609                 }
00610                 return false;
00611         }
00612 
00620         void clear()
00621         {
00622                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)
00623                 {
00624                         if(!m_pDataArray[i])
00625                                 continue;
00626 
00627                         while(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[i]->takeFirst())
00628                         {
00629                                 kvi_hash_key_destroy(e->hKey,m_bDeepCopyKeys);
00630 
00631                                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00632                                         delete ((T *)(e->pData));
00633 
00634                                 delete e;
00635 
00636                                 if(!m_pDataArray[i])
00637                                         break; // emptied in the meantime
00638                         }
00639 
00640                         if(m_pDataArray[i])
00641                         {
00642                                 delete m_pDataArray[i];
00643                                 m_pDataArray[i] = 0;
00644                         }
00645                 }
00646                 m_uCount = 0;
00647         }
00648 
00657         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * findRef(const T * pRef)
00658         {
00659                 for(m_uIteratorIdx = 0;m_uIteratorIdx<m_uSize;m_uIteratorIdx++)
00660                 {
00661                         if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00662                         {
00663                                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();e;e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next())
00664                                 {
00665                                         if(e->pData == pRef)return e;
00666                                 }
00667                         }
00668                 }
00669                 return 0;
00670         }
00671 
00679         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * currentEntry()
00680         {
00681                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00682                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00683                 return 0;
00684         }
00685 
00690         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * firstEntry()
00691         {
00692                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00693                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00694                 {
00695                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00696                 }
00697                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00698                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00699         }
00700 
00708         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * nextEntry()
00709         {
00710                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00711 
00712                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00713                 {
00714                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00715                         if(t)return t;
00716                 }
00717 
00718                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00719 
00720                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00721                 {
00722                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00723                 }
00724 
00725                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00726 
00727                 return m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00728 
00729         }
00730 
00738         T * current()
00739         {
00740                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00741                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00742                 {
00743                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00744                         if(!e)return 0;
00745                         return e->data();
00746                 }
00747                 return 0;
00748         }
00749 
00757         const Key & currentKey()
00758         {
00759                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00760                 if(m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx])
00761                 {
00762                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->current();
00763                         if(!e)return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00764                         return e->key();
00765                 }
00766                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
00767         }
00768 
00774         T * first()
00775         {
00776                 m_uIteratorIdx = 0;
00777                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00778                 {
00779                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00780                 }
00781                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00782                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00783                 if(!e)return 0;
00784                 return e->data();
00785         }
00786 
00794         T * next()
00795         {
00796                 if(m_uIteratorIdx >= m_uSize)return 0;
00797 
00798                 if(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize)
00799                 {
00800                         KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * t = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->next();
00801                         if(t)
00802                         {
00803                                 return t->data();
00804                         }
00805                 }
00806 
00807                 m_uIteratorIdx++;
00808 
00809                 while(m_uIteratorIdx < m_uSize && (!m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]))
00810                 {
00811                         m_uIteratorIdx++;
00812                 }
00813 
00814                 if(m_uIteratorIdx == m_uSize)return 0;
00815 
00816                 KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = m_pDataArray[m_uIteratorIdx]->first();
00817                 if(!e)return 0;
00818                 return e->data();
00819         }
00820 
00831         void copyFrom(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00832         {
00833                 clear();
00834                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00835                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00836         }
00837 
00845         void insert(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00846         {
00847                 for(KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> * e = t.firstEntry();e;e = t.nextEntry())
00848                         insert(e->key(),e->data());
00849         }
00850 
00858         void setAutoDelete(bool bAutoDelete)
00859         {
00860                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
00861         }
00862 
00872         KviPointerHashTable(unsigned int uSize = 32, bool bCaseSensitive = true, bool bDeepCopyKeys = true)
00873         {
00874                 m_uCount = 0;
00875                 m_bCaseSensitive = bCaseSensitive;
00876                 m_bAutoDelete = true;
00877                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = bDeepCopyKeys;
00878                 m_uSize = uSize > 0 ? uSize : 32;
00879                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00880                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00881         }
00882 
00890         KviPointerHashTable(KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & t)
00891         {
00892                 m_uCount = 0;
00893                 m_bAutoDelete = false;
00894                 m_bCaseSensitive = t.m_bCaseSensitive;
00895                 m_bDeepCopyKeys = t.m_bDeepCopyKeys;
00896                 m_uSize = t.m_uSize;
00897                 m_pDataArray = new KviPointerList<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > *[m_uSize];
00898                 for(unsigned int i=0;i<m_uSize;i++)m_pDataArray[i] = NULL;
00899                 copyFrom(t);
00900         }
00901 
00907         ~KviPointerHashTable()
00908         {
00909                 clear();
00910                 delete [] m_pDataArray;
00911         }
00912 };
00913 
00918 template<typename Key,typename T> class KviPointerHashTableIterator
00919 {
00920 protected:
00921         const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> * m_pHashTable;
00922         unsigned int                       m_uEntryIndex;
00923         KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> > * m_pIterator;
00924 public:
00932         void operator = (const KviPointerHashTableIterator<Key,T> & src)
00933         {
00934                 m_pHashTable = src.m_pHashTable;
00935                 m_uEntryIndex = src.m_uEntryIndex;
00936                 if(src.m_pIterator)
00937                         m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(src.m_pIterator));
00938                 else
00939                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00940         }
00941 
00948         bool moveFirst()
00949         {
00950                 if(m_pIterator)
00951                 {
00952                         delete m_pIterator;
00953                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00954                 }
00955 
00956                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
00957                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
00958                 {
00959                         m_uEntryIndex++;
00960                 }
00961 
00962                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
00963                         return false;
00964 
00965                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00966                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
00967                 if(!bRet)
00968                 {
00969                         delete m_pIterator;
00970                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00971                 }
00972                 return bRet;
00973         }
00974 
00981         bool moveLast()
00982         {
00983                 if(m_pIterator)
00984                 {
00985                         delete m_pIterator;
00986                         m_pIterator = NULL;
00987                 }
00988 
00989                 m_uEntryIndex = m_pHashTable->m_uSize;
00990                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
00991                 {
00992                         m_uEntryIndex--;
00993                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
00994                         {
00995                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
00996                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
00997                                 if(!bRet)
00998                                 {
00999                                         delete m_pIterator;
01000                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01001                                 }
01002                                 return bRet;
01003                         }
01004                 }
01005                 return false;
01006         }
01007 
01015         bool moveNext()
01016         {
01017                 if(!m_pIterator)
01018                         return false;
01019                 if(m_pIterator->moveNext())
01020                         return true;
01021                 if(m_pIterator)
01022                 {
01023                         delete m_pIterator;
01024                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01025                 }
01026                 m_uEntryIndex++;
01027                 while((m_uEntryIndex < m_pHashTable->m_uSize) && (!(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])))
01028                 {
01029                         m_uEntryIndex++;
01030                 }
01031                 if(m_uEntryIndex == m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
01032                         return false;
01033                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01034                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveFirst();
01035                 if(!bRet)
01036                 {
01037                         delete m_pIterator;
01038                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01039                 }
01040                 return bRet;
01041         }
01042 
01051         bool operator ++()
01052         {
01053                 return moveNext();
01054         }
01055 
01064         bool movePrev()
01065         {
01066                 if(!m_pIterator)
01067                         return false;
01068                 if(m_pIterator->movePrev())
01069                         return true;
01070                 if(m_pIterator)
01071                 {
01072                         delete m_pIterator;
01073                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01074                 }
01075                 if(m_uEntryIndex >= m_pHashTable->m_uSize)
01076                         return false;
01077                 while(m_uEntryIndex > 0)
01078                 {
01079                         m_uEntryIndex--;
01080                         if(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex])
01081                         {
01082                                 m_pIterator = new KviPointerListIterator<KviPointerHashTableEntry<Key,T> >(*(m_pHashTable->m_pDataArray[m_uEntryIndex]));
01083                                 bool bRet = m_pIterator->moveLast();
01084                                 if(!bRet)
01085                                 {
01086                                         delete m_pIterator;
01087                                         m_pIterator = NULL;
01088                                 }
01089                                 return bRet;
01090                         }
01091                 }
01092                 return false;
01093         }
01094 
01104         bool operator --()
01105         {
01106                 return movePrev();
01107         }
01108 
01116         T * current() const
01117         {
01118                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01119         }
01120 
01128         T * operator *() const
01129         {
01130                 return m_pIterator ? m_pIterator->current()->data() : NULL;
01131         }
01132 
01139         const Key & currentKey() const
01140         {
01141                 if(m_pIterator)
01142                         return m_pIterator->current()->key();
01143                 return kvi_hash_key_default(((Key *)NULL));
01144         }
01145 
01152         T * toFirst()
01153         {
01154                 if(!moveFirst())
01155                         return NULL;
01156                 return current();
01157         }
01158 public:
01164         KviPointerHashTableIterator(const KviPointerHashTable<Key,T> & hTable)
01165         {
01166                 m_pHashTable = &hTable;
01167                 m_uEntryIndex = 0;
01168                 m_pIterator = NULL;
01169                 moveFirst();
01170         }
01171 
01175         ~KviPointerHashTableIterator()
01176         {
01177                 if(m_pIterator)
01178                         delete m_pIterator;
01179         }
01180 };
